thread.title: Robben sparkles as Bayern clinch 1000th Bundesliga victory
thread.title_full: Robben sparkles as Bayern clinch 1000th Bundesliga victory

author: NewsWire
title: Robben sparkles as Bayern clinch 1000th Bundesliga victory
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
London, Oct.25 (ANI): Arjen Robben produced a sparkling performance on his comeback after two months as Bayern Munich thrashed Koln 4-0 to clinch their 1000th victory in the Bundesliga. 
Robben, who had been out of the team since September due to injury, opened the scoring in the 35th minute before Arturo Vidal doubled the lead five minutes later. 
Bundesliga’s top-scorer Robert Lewandowski then joined the party with a glancing header in the 62nd minute before Thomas Muller added their fourth goal with a well-taken penalty, the Guardian reported. 
With the win, Bayern moved to the top of the points table and are 10 points ahead of second-placed Borussia Dortmund. (ANI) Related Posts
